Package be.belegkarnil.game.board.spectrangle.gui

package be.belegkarnil.game.board.spectrangle.gui
Contains all of the classes for creating user interfaces of the Spectrangle game and for painting the triangle pieces.
Since:
2025-04-22
Version:
0.9
Author:
Belegkarnil
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    be.belegkarnil.game.board.spectrangle
    Contains all of the classes for creating, instancing a Spectrangle game and for playing.
    be.belegkarnil.game.board.spectrangle.event
    Provides interfaces and classes for dealing with different types of events fired by the Spectrangle game components.
    be.belegkarnil.game.board.spectrangle.strategy
    Contains the Strategy interface to implements IA and some concrete example that are able to interact within the Spectrangle game.
